title: Bravissima Script : : Bon appétit
content:
Submitted by [Ale Paul](http://web.archive.org/web/20100103121920/http:/typophile.com/user/827 "View user profile.") : 5.Nov.2009 1.53pm 

SUDTIPOS :: NEW RELEASE :: 11.2009

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20100103121920im_/http:/typophile.com/files/typophilebravissima_5373.jpg)

**[Bravissima Script](http://web.archive.org/web/20100103121920/http:/www.veer.com/products/typedetail.aspx?image=UMT0000504)** is the dynamic and spirited embodiment of the 1970s, when food was food and the wild brush ruled. It tells you to eat, and to do it right now. Another perfect blend of traditional Koziupa calligraphy and Paul art direction and tech, spiced up with OpenType features like the meal of your dreams. A personal favorite for food packaging design, especially hot stuff. Bon appétit.
author: Ale Paul
